titleStmt.title: The Earl of Essex his speech, at the delivering the following petition to His Most Sacred Majesty, Jan. 25, 80 [i.e. 1681]
titleStmt.author: Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

notesStmt.note: Includes also the petition against holding the Parliament at Oxford, signed: Monmouth, Kent, Hunting [and 13 others].
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
